entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and a friend of Harry's. He buys Harry a hamburger and tries to get him to talk about his feelings.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Mr Ollivander is a wand maker who thinks Harry is special. This is mentioned by Harry as one of the people who think he's special.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is another person who thinks Harry is special. He is mentioned by Harry as someone who has an opinion about him.
